original_text: And if his father has no brothers, then you shall give his inheritance to the nearest kinsman of his clan, and he shall possess it. And it shall be for the people of Israel a statute and rule, as the Lord commanded Moses.’”
korean_text: 그의 아버지의 형제도 없으면 그의 기업을 가장 가까운 친족에게 주어 받게 할지니라 하고 나 여호와가 너 모세에게 명령한 대로 이스라엘 자손에게 판결의 규례가 되게 할지니라

sentences.original_text: And if his father has no brothers,
then you shall give his inheritance
to the nearest kinsman of his clan,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 족속 중 가장 가까운 친족에게,

sentences.original_text: And it shall be for the people of Israel
